trans-unit.source: Return the kind of scalar represented by typenum and the array in *arr (if arr is not NULL ). The array is assumed to be rank-0 and only used if typenum represents a signed integer. If arr is not NULL and the first element is negative then NPY_INTNEG_SCALAR is returned, otherwise NPY_INTPOS_SCALAR is returned. The possible return values are the enumerated values in NPY_SCALARKIND.

Return the kind of scalar represented by typenum and the array in *arr (if arr is not NULL ). The array is assumed to be rank-0 and only used if typenum represents a signed integer. If arr is not NULL and the first element is negative then NPY_INTNEG_SCALAR is returned, otherwise NPY_INTPOS_SCALAR is returned. The possible return values are NPY_{kind}_SCALAR where {kind} can be INTPOS, INTNEG, FLOAT, COMPLEX, BOOL, or OBJECT. NPY_NOSCALAR is also an enumerated value NPY_SCALARKIND variables can take on.
trans-unit.target: 返回由typenum和* arr中的数组表示的标量类型（如果arr不是 NULL ）。假定该数组为等级0，并且仅在typenum表示有符号整数时使用。如果ARR是不是 NULL 和第一个元素是负数， NPY_INTNEG_SCALAR 返回，否则 NPY_INTPOS_SCALAR 返回。可能的返回值是 NPY_{kind}_SCALAR ，其中 {kind} 可以是INTPOS，INTNEG，FLOAT，COMPLEX，BOOL或对象。 NPY_NOSCALAR 也是 NPY_SCALARKIND 变量可以采用的枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Return the largest integer smaller or equal to the division of the inputs.

trans-unit.source: Return the largest integer smaller or equal to the division of the inputs. It is equivalent to the Python // operator and pairs with the Python % (remainder), function so that a = a % b + b * (a // b) up to roundoff.
trans-unit.target: 返回小于或等于输入除法的最大整数。它等效于Python // 运算符，并与Python % （ remainder ）函数配对，以便 a = a % b + b * (a // b) 直至四舍五入。

trans-unit.source: Return the low-level casting function to cast from the given descriptor to the builtin type number. If no casting function exists return NULL and set an error. Using this function instead of direct access to from ->f->cast will allow support of any user-defined casting functions added to a descriptors casting dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 返回低级转换函数以将给定的描述符转换为内置类型编号。如果不存在任何强制转换函数，则返回 NULL 并设置错误。使用此功能，而不是直接从 -> f-> cast中访问，将允许支持添加到描述符转换字典的任何用户定义的转换功能。

Returns (mantissa, exponent), where x = mantissa * 2**exponent`. The mantissa is lies in the open interval(-1, 1), while the twos exponent is a signed integer.

trans-unit.source: Returns 0 if nothing was done, -1 on error, and 1 if action was taken.
trans-unit.target: 如果什么都没做,则返回0;如果出错,则返回-1;如果采取了行动,则返回1。

trans-unit.source: Returns 0 on success, -1 on error.
trans-unit.target: 成功时返回0,错误时返回-1。

trans-unit.source: Returns 0 when x2 is 0 and both x1 and x2 are (arrays of) integers. mod is an alias of remainder.
trans-unit.target: 当 x2 为0并且 x1 和 x2 均为整数（的数组）时，返回0 。 mod 是 remainder 的别名。

trans-unit.source: Returns 1 if the caller needs to handle the inner-most 1-dimensional loop, or 0 if the iterator handles all looping. This is controlled by the constructor flag NPY_ITER_EXTERNAL_LOOP or NpyIter_EnableExternalLoop.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用者需要处理最里面的一维循环，则返回1；如果迭代器处理所有循环，则返回0。这由构造器标志 NPY_ITER_EXTERNAL_LOOP 或 NpyIter_EnableExternalLoop 控制。

trans-unit.source: Returns 1 if the flag NPY_ITER_DELAY_BUFALLOC was passed to the iterator constructor, and no call to one of the Reset functions has been done yet, 0 otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果将标志 NPY_ITER_DELAY_BUFALLOC 传递给迭代器构造函数，并且尚未完成对Reset函数之一的调用，则返回1；否则返回0。

trans-unit.source: Returns 1 if the iterator requires buffering, which occurs when an operand needs conversion or alignment and so cannot be used directly.
trans-unit.target: 如果迭代器需要缓冲,则返回1,当操作数需要转换或对齐时,会发生缓冲,因此不能直接使用。

trans-unit.source: Returns 1 if the iterator was created with the NPY_ITER_BUFFERED flag, 0 otherwise.

trans-unit.source: Returns 1 if the iterator was created with the NPY_ITER_C_INDEX or NPY_ITER_F_INDEX flag, 0 otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果迭代器是使用 NPY_ITER_C_INDEX 或 NPY_ITER_F_INDEX 标志创建的，则返回1，否则返回0。

trans-unit.source: Returns 1 if the iterator was created with the NPY_ITER_GROWINNER flag, 0 otherwise.

trans-unit.source: Returns NPY_SUCCEED or NPY_FAIL.
trans-unit.target: 返回 NPY_SUCCEED 或 NPY_FAIL 。

trans-unit.source: Returns NPY_SUCCEED or NPY_FAIL. If errmsg is non-NULL, no Python exception is set when NPY_FAIL is returned. Instead, *errmsg is set to an error message. When errmsg is non-NULL, the function may be safely called without holding the Python GIL.
trans-unit.target: 返回 NPY_SUCCEED 或 NPY_FAIL 。如果errmsg为非NULL，则在返回 NPY_FAIL 时未设置Python异常。而是将* errmsg设置为错误消息。当errmsg为非NULL时，无需持有Python GIL即可安全地调用该函数。

trans-unit.source: Returns NULL if there is an error. If errmsg is non-NULL, no Python exception is set when NPY_FAIL is returned. Instead, *errmsg is set to an error message. When errmsg is non-NULL, the function may be safely called without holding the Python GIL.

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean array of the same shape as x, True where x == +/-inf, otherwise False.
trans-unit.target: 返回与 x 形状相同的布尔数组，如果 x == +/-inf ，则返回True ，否则返回False。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean array of where a and b are equal within the given tolerance. If both a and b are scalars, returns a single boolean value.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔数组，其中 a 和 b 在给定的公差范围内相等。如果 a 和 b 均为标量，则返回单个布尔值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean array the same length as ar1 that is True where an element of ar1 is in ar2 and False otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔阵列相同的长度 ar1 其为True，其中的一个元件 ar1 是在 ar2 ，否则为假。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean array where two arrays are element-wise equal within a tolerance.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔数组,其中两个数组在公差范围内元素相等。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean array which is True where the string element in a ends with suffix, otherwise False.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔阵列是 True ，其中在字符串元素 a 与端部 suffix ，否则 False 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean array which is True where the string element in a starts with prefix, otherwise False.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔数组是 True 地方在字符串元素 a 与开始 prefix ，否则 False 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean array which is True where the string element in self ends with suffix, otherwise False.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔数组，该数组为 True ，其中 self 的字符串元素以 suffix 结尾，否则为 False 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean array which is True where the string element in self starts with prefix, otherwise False.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔数组，该数组为 True ，其中 self 中的字符串元素以 prefix 开头，否则为 False 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a borrowed reference to the dtype property (PyArray_Descr*) of a, assuming a can be cast to a PyArrayObject*.
trans-unit.target: 返回借用参考D型属性（ PyArray_Descr* 的） a ，假设 a 可以转换为一个 PyArrayObject* 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a borrowed reference to the dtype property of the array.
trans-unit.target: 返回对数组dtype属性的借用引用。

trans-unit.source: Returns a data-type object corresponding to typenum. The typenum can be one of the enumerated types, a character code for one of the enumerated types, or a user-defined type. If you want to use a flexible size array, then you need to flexible typenum and set the results elsize parameter to the desired size. The typenum is one of the NPY_TYPES.
trans-unit.target: 返回与typenum对应的数据类型对象。所述typenum可以是枚举类型中的一个，所列举的类型中的一种，或用户定义的类型的字符码。如果要使用灵活大小的数组，则需要 flexible typenum 并将结果 elsize 参数设置为所需大小。typenum是 NPY_TYPES 之一。

trans-unit.source: Returns a data-type object corresponding to typenum. The typenum can be one of the enumerated types, a character code for one of the enumerated types, or a user-defined type. If you want to use a flexible size array, then you need to flexible typenum and set the results elsize parameter to the desired size. The typenum is one of the NPY_TYPES.
Returns a dictionary with fields indexing lists of their parent fields.
Returns a field of the given array as a certain type.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定数组中某个类型的字段。

trans-unit.source: Returns a flattened copy of an array.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个数组的扁平化副本。

trans-unit.source: Returns a function pointer for getting the current multi-index of the iterator. Returns NULL if the iterator is not tracking a multi-index. It is recommended that this function pointer be cached in a local variable before the iteration loop.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个函数指针,用于获取迭代器的当前多索引。如果迭代器没有跟踪一个多索引,则返回NULL。建议在迭代循环之前,将这个函数指针缓存在一个本地变量中。

trans-unit.source: Returns a function pointer for iteration. A specialized version of the function pointer may be calculated by this function instead of being stored in the iterator structure. Thus, to get good performance, it is required that the function pointer be saved in a variable rather than retrieved for each loop iteration.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个用于迭代的函数指针。函数指针的特殊版本可以由该函数计算,而不是存储在迭代器结构中。因此,为了获得良好的性能,需要将函数指针保存在一个变量中,而不是在每次循环迭代时检索。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of files named ‘fname’ from 1) System-wide directory (directory-location of this module) 2) Users HOME directory (os.environ[‘HOME’]) 3) Local directory
trans-unit.target: 从以下位置返回名为“ fname”的文件的列表：1）系统范围的目录（此模块的目录位置）2）用户HOME目录（os.environ ['HOME']）3）本地目录

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of slices corresponding to the masked clumps of a 1-D array.
trans-unit.target: 返回对应于一维数组的蒙版团块的切片列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of slices corresponding to the masked clumps of a 1-D array. (A “clump” is defined as a contiguous region of the array).
trans-unit.target: 返回与一维数组的蒙版块相对应的切片列表。（“团”被定义为数组的连续区域）。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list with types grouped input->output.
trans-unit.target: 返回类型分组为input-> output的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a masked array containing the same data, but with a new shape. The result is a view on the original array; if this is not possible, a ValueError is raised.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含相同数据的掩码数组,但有一个新的形状。结果是原始数组的视图;如果无法实现,将引发一个ValueError。

trans-unit.source: Returns a matrix from an array-like object, or from a string of data. A matrix is a specialized 2-D array that retains its 2-D nature through operations. It has certain special operators, such as * (matrix multiplication) and ** (matrix power).
trans-unit.target: 从类似数组的对象或数据字符串中返回一个矩阵。矩阵是专用的二维数组，可通过操作保留其二维性质。它具有某些特殊的运算符，例如 * （矩阵乘法）和 ** （矩阵幂）。

trans-unit.source: Returns a matrix object, which is a specialized 2-D array.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个矩阵对象,它是一个专门的二维数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new bit generator with the state jumped
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的跳转状态的比特发生器。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new bit generator with the state jumped.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的位生成器,其状态为跳转。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new dtype object, with the type of all fields in ndtype to a boolean type. Field names are not altered.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的dtype对象，其 ndtype 中所有字段的类型均为布尔型。字段名称未更改。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new numpy.recarray with fields in drop_names dropped.
Returns a pointer to an array of the nop strides, one for each iterated object, to be used by the inner loop.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个指向由内部循环使用的 nop 步幅数组的指针，每个迭代对象一个。

trans-unit.source: Returns a pointer to the dimensions/shape of the array. The number of elements matches the number of dimensions of the array. Can return NULL for 0-dimensional arrays.
trans-unit.target: 返回指向数组尺寸/形状的指针。元素的数量与数组的维数匹配。可以为0维数组返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a pointer to the number of iterations the inner loop should execute.
trans-unit.target: 返回指向内循环应该执行的迭代次数的指针。

trans-unit.source: Returns a pointer to the strides of the array. The number of elements matches the number of dimensions of the array.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个指向数组步长的指针。元素的数量与数组的维数一致。

trans-unit.source: Returns a scalar type-object from a type-number, type . Equivalent to PyArray_DescrFromType (type)->typeobj except for reference counting and error-checking. Returns a new reference to the typeobject on success or NULL on failure.
trans-unit.target: 从类型编号type返回标量类型对象。等效于 PyArray_DescrFromType （type）-> typeobj，除了引用计数和错误检查以外。成功返回对类型对象的新引用，失败则返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a series representing the product (x - r[0])*(x - r[1])*...*(x - r[n-1]), where r is a list of roots.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示乘积 (x - r[0])*(x - r[1])*...*(x - r[n-1]) ，其中 r 是根的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a single bool if axis is None; otherwise, returns ndarray
trans-unit.target: 如果 axis 为 None ，则返回单个布尔值；否则，返回 ndarray

trans-unit.source: Returns a standard numpy.recarray (if usemask=False) or a MaskedRecords array (if usemaske=True). The default dtype is dtype=None, meaning that the types of each column will be automatically determined.
Returns a true division of the inputs, element-wise.
trans-unit.target: 返回输入的真实除法,按元素计算。

trans-unit.source: Returns a tuple containing the indices of the current iteration.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含当前迭代指数的元组。

trans-unit.source: Returns a tuple of numpy.flatiter objects, one for each “component” of self.
trans-unit.target: 返回的元组 numpy.flatiter 对象，每一个的“组件” self 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a tuple of arrays, one for each dimension of a, containing the indices of the non-zero elements in that dimension. The values in a are always tested and returned in row-major, C-style order.
trans-unit.target: 返回阵列的一个元组，一个用于的每个维度 a ，包含在该维度中的非零元素的索引。中的数值 a 始终测试和行为主，C风格的顺序返回。

trans-unit.source: Returns a tuple of arrays, one for each dimension, containing the indices of the non-zero elements in that dimension. The corresponding non-zero values can be obtained with:
trans-unit.target: 返回一个数组,每个维度一个,包含该维度中非零元素的索引。相应的非零值可以通过以下方法获得。

trans-unit.source: Returns a tuple of arrays, with grid[i].shape = (1, ..., 1, dimensions[i], 1, ..., 1) with dimensions[i] in the ith place
trans-unit.target: 返回数组的元组，其中 grid[i].shape = (1, ..., 1, dimensions[i], 1, ..., 1) ，尺寸为[i]，在第i个位置

trans-unit.source: Returns a view of the array with axes transposed.
trans-unit.target: 返回转置轴的数组视图。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array containing the same data with a new shape.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含相同数据的数组,但有一个新的形状。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of anomalies, with the same shape as the input and where the arithmetic mean is computed along the given axis.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个异常数组,其形状与输入相同,算术平均值沿给定轴计算。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array representing a linear polynomial.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个代表线性多项式的数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array with the number of non-overlapping occurrences of substring sub in the range [start, end].
trans-unit.target: 返回一个数组，该数组的子字符串 sub 的不重叠出现次数在[ start ， end ] 范围内。

trans-unit.source: Returns an element-wise indication of the sign of a number.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个数字符号的按元素排列的指示。

trans-unit.source: Returns an integer representing the array-flags.
Returns an integer representing the flags of a, assuming a can be cast to a PyArrayObject*.
trans-unit.target: 假设 a 可以 PyArrayObject* 转换为PyArrayObject *，则返回表示 a 标志的整数。

trans-unit.source: Returns an ndarray object from a Python object that exposes the __array_interface__ attribute following the array interface protocol. If the object does not contain this attribute then a borrowed reference to Py_NotImplemented is returned.

Returns an ndarray object from a Python object that exposes the __array_interface__ attribute following the array interface protocol. If the object does not contain this attribute then a borrowed reference to Py_NotImplemented is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回从暴露该Python对象的对象ndarray __array_interface__ 以下阵列接口协议属性。如果对象不包含此属性，则返回对 Py_NotImplemented 的借用引用。

trans-unit.source: Returns an ndarray object from a Python object that exposes the __array_struct__ attribute and follows the array interface protocol. If the object does not contain this attribute then a borrowed reference to Py_NotImplemented is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回从暴露该Python对象的对象ndarray __array_struct__ 属性和如下所述阵列接口协议。如果对象不包含此属性，则返回对 Py_NotImplemented 的借用引用。

trans-unit.source: Returns array of indices of the maximum values along the given axis.
trans-unit.target: 返回沿给定轴线的最大值的指数数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns array of indices of the maximum values along the given axis. Masked values are treated as if they had the value fill_value.
trans-unit.target: 返回沿给定轴的最大值的指数数组。屏蔽的值会被当作有 fill_value 的值来处理。

trans-unit.source: Returns dtype for the base element of the subarrays, regardless of their dimension or shape.
trans-unit.target: 返回子数组的基本元素的dtype,无论其尺寸或形状如何。

trans-unit.source: Returns either a new reference to self if dtype is not given or a new array of provided data type if dtype is different from the current dtype of the array.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有给定dtype,则返回对self的新引用;如果dtype与数组的当前dtype不同,则返回提供的数据类型的新数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns element-wise True where signbit is set (less than zero).
trans-unit.target: 当signbit被设置为(小于0)时,返回元素式的True。

trans-unit.source: Returns element-wise base array raised to power from second array.
trans-unit.target: 返回从第二个数组中提升到幂的元素基数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns non-zero if arr can be cast to totype according to the casting rule given in casting. If arr is an array scalar, its value is taken into account, and non-zero is also returned when the value will not overflow or be truncated to an integer when converting to a smaller type.
trans-unit.target: 返回非零值，如果ARR可以转换为totype根据给出的规则铸造铸件。如果arr是数组标量，则将其值考虑在内，并且当该值不会溢出或在转换为较小类型时被截断为整数时，也会返回非零值。

trans-unit.source: Returns non-zero if an array of data type fromtype (which can include flexible types) can be cast safely to an array of data type totype (which can include flexible types) according to the casting rule casting. For simple types with NPY_SAFE_CASTING, this is basically a wrapper around PyArray_CanCastSafely, but for flexible types such as strings or unicode, it produces results taking into account their sizes. Integer and float types can only be cast to a string or unicode type using NPY_SAFE_CASTING if the string or unicode type is big enough to hold the max value of the integer/float type being cast from.
trans-unit.target: 返回非零值，如果数据类型的数组fromtype（其可以包括柔性的类型）可以安全地强制转换为数据类型的数组totype根据铸造规则（其可以包括柔性的类型）铸造。对于带有 NPY_SAFE_CASTING 的简单类型，基本上是 PyArray_CanCastSafely 的包装，但是对于诸如字符串或unicode之类的灵活类型，它会在考虑其大小的情况下生成结果。如果字符串或Unicode类型的大小足以容纳要从其进行转换的整数/浮点类型的最大值，则只能使用 NPY_SAFE_CASTING 将整数和浮点类型转换为字符串或Unicode类型。

trans-unit.source: Returns non-zero if an array of data type fromtype can be cast to an array of data type totype without losing information. An exception is that 64-bit integers are allowed to be cast to 64-bit floating point values even though this can lose precision on large integers so as not to proliferate the use of long doubles without explicit requests. Flexible array types are not checked according to their lengths with this function.
trans-unit.target: 返回非零值，如果数据类型的数组fromtype可以转换为数据类型的数组totype而不丢失信息。一个例外是允许将64位整数强制转换为64位浮点值，即使这可能会丢失大整数的精度，以免在没有显式请求的情况下不增加使用长双精度数。使用此功能不会根据其长度检查灵活的数组类型。

trans-unit.source: Returns one array of grid indices, grid.shape = (len(dimensions),) + tuple(dimensions).
trans-unit.target: 返回一个网格索引数组 grid.shape = (len(dimensions),) + tuple(dimensions) 。

trans-unit.source: Returns pointers to the end-points of an array.
Returns single boolean unless axis is not None
trans-unit.target: 返回单个布尔值，除非 axis 不为 None

trans-unit.source: Returns the (complex) conjugate transpose of self.
trans-unit.target: 返回 self 的（复杂）共轭转置。

trans-unit.source: Returns the (multiplicative) inverse of invertible self.
trans-unit.target: 返回可逆 self 的（乘法）逆。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <n>-th dimension of an array <name>.
Returns the Chebyshev series c raised to the power pow. The argument c is a sequence of coefficients ordered from low to high. i.e., [1,2,3] is the series T_0 + 2*T_1 + 3*T_2.
trans-unit.target: 返回切比雪夫系列 c 幂 pow 。自变量 c 是从低到高排序的系数序列。即[1,2,3]是序列 T_0 + 2*T_1 + 3*T_2.

trans-unit.source: Returns the Chebyshev series coefficients c differentiated m times along axis. At each iteration the result is multiplied by scl (the scaling factor is for use in a linear change of variable). The argument c is an array of coefficients from low to high degree along each axis, e.g., [1,2,3] represents the series 1*T_0 + 2*T_1 + 3*T_2 while [[1,2],[1,2]] represents 1*T_0(x)*T_0(y) + 1*T_1(x)*T_0(y) + 2*T_0(x)*T_1(y) + 2*T_1(x)*T_1(y) if axis=0 is x and axis=1 is y.
trans-unit.target: 返回沿 axis 相差 m 次的Chebyshev级数 c 。在每次迭代中，结果乘以 scl （比例因子用于变量的线性变化）。自变量 c 是沿每个轴从低到高的系数数组，例如[1,2,3]表示级数 1*T_0 + 2*T_1 + 3*T_2 而[[1,2]，[1 ，2]]表示 1*T_0(x)*T_0(y) + 1*T_1(x)*T_0(y) + 2*T_0(x)*T_1(y) + 2*T_1(x)*T_1(y) 如果axis = 0是 x 并且axis = 1是 y 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the Chebyshev series coefficients c integrated m times from lbnd along axis. At each iteration the resulting series is multiplied by scl and an integration constant, k, is added. The scaling factor is for use in a linear change of variable. (“Buyer beware”: note that, depending on what one is doing, one may want scl to be the reciprocal of what one might expect; for more information, see the Notes section below.) The argument c is an array of coefficients from low to high degree along each axis, e.g., [1,2,3] represents the series T_0 + 2*T_1 + 3*T_2 while [[1,2],[1,2]] represents 1*T_0(x)*T_0(y) + 1*T_1(x)*T_0(y) + 2*T_0(x)*T_1(y) + 2*T_1(x)*T_1(y) if axis=0 is x and axis=1 is y.
trans-unit.target: 返回切比雪夫级数系数 c 集成 m 从倍 lbnd 沿 axis 。在每一次迭代所得的系列相乘由 scl 和积分常数， k ，加入。比例因子用于变量的线性变化。 （“买方要当心”：请注意，根据所执行的操作，可能希望 scl 是所期望的值的倒数；有关更多信息，请参见下面的“注释”部分。）参数 c 是来自以下项的系数数组沿每个轴从低到高，例如[1,2,3]代表序列 T_0 + 2*T_1 + 3*T_2 而[[1,2]，[1,2]]表示 1*T_0(x)*T_0(y) + 1*T_1(x)*T_0(y) + 2*T_0(x)*T_1(y) + 2*T_1(x)*T_1(y) 如果axis = 0是 x 并且axis = 1是 y 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the Chebyshev series that interpolates func at the Chebyshev points of the first kind in the interval [-1, 1]. The interpolating series tends to a minmax approximation to func with increasing deg if the function is continuous in the interval.
Returns the Hermite series c raised to the power pow. The argument c is a sequence of coefficients ordered from low to high. i.e., [1,2,3] is the series P_0 + 2*P_1 + 3*P_2.
trans-unit.target: 返回埃尔米特系列 c 幂 pow 。自变量 c 是从低到高排序的系数序列。即[1,2,3]是级数 P_0 + 2*P_1 + 3*P_2.

trans-unit.source: Returns the Hermite series coefficients c differentiated m times along axis. At each iteration the result is multiplied by scl (the scaling factor is for use in a linear change of variable). The argument c is an array of coefficients from low to high degree along each axis, e.g., [1,2,3] represents the series 1*H_0 + 2*H_1 + 3*H_2 while [[1,2],[1,2]] represents 1*H_0(x)*H_0(y) + 1*H_1(x)*H_0(y) + 2*H_0(x)*H_1(y) + 2*H_1(x)*H_1(y) if axis=0 is x and axis=1 is y.
trans-unit.target: 返回沿 axis 相差 m 次的Hermite级数 c 。在每次迭代中，结果乘以 scl （比例因子用于变量的线性变化）。自变量 c 是沿每个轴从低到高的系数数组，例如[1,2,3]表示级数 1*H_0 + 2*H_1 + 3*H_2 而[[1,2]，[1 ，2]]表示 1*H_0(x)*H_0(y) + 1*H_1(x)*H_0(y) + 2*H_0(x)*H_1(y) + 2*H_1(x)*H_1(y) 如果axis = 0是 x 并且axis = 1是 y 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the Hermite series coefficients c integrated m times from lbnd along axis. At each iteration the resulting series is multiplied by scl and an integration constant, k, is added. The scaling factor is for use in a linear change of variable. (“Buyer beware”: note that, depending on what one is doing, one may want scl to be the reciprocal of what one might expect; for more information, see the Notes section below.) The argument c is an array of coefficients from low to high degree along each axis, e.g., [1,2,3] represents the series H_0 + 2*H_1 + 3*H_2 while [[1,2],[1,2]] represents 1*H_0(x)*H_0(y) + 1*H_1(x)*H_0(y) + 2*H_0(x)*H_1(y) + 2*H_1(x)*H_1(y) if axis=0 is x and axis=1 is y.
trans-unit.target: 返回Hermite级数系数 c ，从 lbnd 沿 axis 积分 m 次。在每一次迭代所得的系列相乘由 scl 和积分常数， k ，加入。比例因子用于变量的线性变化。 （“买方要当心”：请注意，根据所执行的操作，可能希望 scl 是所期望值的倒数；有关更多信息，请参见下面的“注释”部分。）参数 c 是来自以下项的系数数组沿每个轴从低到高，例如[1,2,3]代表序列 H_0 + 2*H_1 + 3*H_2 而[[1,2]，[1,2]]表示 1*H_0(x)*H_0(y) + 1*H_1(x)*H_0(y) + 2*H_0(x)*H_1(y) + 2*H_1(x)*H_1(y) 如果axis = 0为 x 并且axis = 1为 y ,则+ 2 * H_1（x）* H_1（y）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the Hermite_e series coefficients c integrated m times from lbnd along axis. At each iteration the resulting series is multiplied by scl and an integration constant, k, is added. The scaling factor is for use in a linear change of variable. (“Buyer beware”: note that, depending on what one is doing, one may want scl to be the reciprocal of what one might expect; for more information, see the Notes section below.) The argument c is an array of coefficients from low to high degree along each axis, e.g., [1,2,3] represents the series H_0 + 2*H_1 + 3*H_2 while [[1,2],[1,2]] represents 1*H_0(x)*H_0(y) + 1*H_1(x)*H_0(y) + 2*H_0(x)*H_1(y) + 2*H_1(x)*H_1(y) if axis=0 is x and axis=1 is y.
trans-unit.target: 返回Hermite_e系列系数 c ，从 lbnd 沿 axis 积分 m 次。在每一次迭代所得的系列相乘由 scl 和积分常数， k ，加入。比例因子用于变量的线性变化。 （“买方要当心”：请注意，根据所执行的操作，可能希望 scl 是所期望值的倒数；有关更多信息，请参见下面的“注释”部分。）参数 c 是来自以下项的系数数组沿每个轴从低到高，例如[1,2,3]代表序列 H_0 + 2*H_1 + 3*H_2 而[[1,2]，[1,2]]表示 1*H_0(x)*H_0(y) + 1*H_1(x)*H_0(y) + 2*H_0(x)*H_1(y) + 2*H_1(x)*H_1(y) 如果axis = 0为 x 并且axis = 1为 y ,则+ 2 * H_1（x）* H_1（y）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the Laguerre series c raised to the power pow. The argument c is a sequence of coefficients ordered from low to high. i.e., [1,2,3] is the series P_0 + 2*P_1 + 3*P_2.
trans-unit.target: 返回升至功率 pow 的Laguerre级数 c 。自变量 c 是从低到高排序的系数序列。即[1,2,3]是级数 P_0 + 2*P_1 + 3*P_2.

trans-unit.source: Returns the Laguerre series coefficients c differentiated m times along axis. At each iteration the result is multiplied by scl (the scaling factor is for use in a linear change of variable). The argument c is an array of coefficients from low to high degree along each axis, e.g., [1,2,3] represents the series 1*L_0 + 2*L_1 + 3*L_2 while [[1,2],[1,2]] represents 1*L_0(x)*L_0(y) + 1*L_1(x)*L_0(y) + 2*L_0(x)*L_1(y) + 2*L_1(x)*L_1(y) if axis=0 is x and axis=1 is y.
trans-unit.target: 返回沿 axis 相差 m 次的Laguerre级数 c 。在每次迭代中，结果乘以 scl （比例因子用于变量的线性变化）。自变量 c 是沿每个轴从低到高的系数数组，例如[1,2,3]表示序列 1*L_0 + 2*L_1 + 3*L_2 而[[1,2]，[1 ，2]]表示 1*L_0(x)*L_0(y) + 1*L_1(x)*L_0(y) + 2*L_0(x)*L_1(y) + 2*L_1(x)*L_1(y) 如果axis = 0是 x 并且axis = 1是 y 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the Laguerre series coefficients c integrated m times from lbnd along axis. (“Buyer beware”: note that, depending on what one is doing, one may want scl to be the reciprocal of what one might expect; for more information, see the Notes section below.) The argument c is an array of coefficients from low to high degree along each axis, e.g., [1,2,3] represents the series L_0 + 2*L_1 + 3*L_2 while [[1,2],[1,2]] represents 1*L_0(x)*L_0(y) + 1*L_1(x)*L_0(y) + 2*L_0(x)*L_1(y) + 2*L_1(x)*L_1(y) if axis=0 is x and axis=1 is y.
trans-unit.target: 返回从 lbnd 沿 axis m 积分的Laguerre级数 c 。在每一次迭代所得的系列相乘由 scl 和积分常数， k ，加入。比例因子用于变量的线性变化。 （“买方要当心”：请注意，根据所执行的操作，可能希望 scl 是所期望值的倒数；有关更多信息，请参见下面的“注释”部分。）参数 c 是来自以下项的系数数组沿每个轴从低到高，例如，[1,2,3]代表序列 L_0 + 2*L_1 + 3*L_2 而[[1,2]，[1,2]]表示 1*L_0(x)*L_0(y) + 1*L_1(x)*L_0(y) + 2*L_0(x)*L_1(y) + 2*L_1(x)*L_1(y) 如果axis = 0是 x 并且axis = 1是 y 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the Legendre series coefficients c differentiated m times along axis. The argument c is an array of coefficients from low to high degree along each axis, e.g., [1,2,3] represents the series 1*L_0 + 2*L_1 + 3*L_2 while [[1,2],[1,2]] represents 1*L_0(x)*L_0(y) + 1*L_1(x)*L_0(y) + 2*L_0(x)*L_1(y) + 2*L_1(x)*L_1(y) if axis=0 is x and axis=1 is y.

trans-unit.source: Returns the Legendre series coefficients c integrated m times from lbnd along axis. At each iteration the resulting series is multiplied by scl and an integration constant, k, is added. The scaling factor is for use in a linear change of variable. (“Buyer beware”: note that, depending on what one is doing, one may want scl to be the reciprocal of what one might expect; for more information, see the Notes section below.) trans-unit.target: 返回程度的Vandermonde矩阵 deg 和采样点 x 。Vandermonde矩阵定义为

trans-unit.source: Returns the average of the array elements along given axis.
trans-unit.target: 返回沿给定轴的数组元素的平均值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the average of the array elements. The average is taken over the flattened array by default, otherwise over the specified axis. float64 intermediate and return values are used for integer inputs.
trans-unit.target: 返回数组元素的平均值。默认情况下，平均值取自展平的数组，否则取自指定的轴。 float64 中间值和返回值用于整数输入。

trans-unit.source: Returns the average of the matrix elements along the given axis.
trans-unit.target: 返回沿给定轴的矩阵元素的平均值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the broadcast shape of the iterator in outshape. This can only be called on an iterator which is tracking a multi-index.
trans-unit.target: 以 outshape 返回迭代器的广播形状。这只能在跟踪多索引的迭代器上调用。

trans-unit.source: Returns the coefficients of the polynomial whose leading coefficient is one for the given sequence of zeros (multiple roots must be included in the sequence as many times as their multiplicity; see Examples). A square matrix (or array, which will be treated as a matrix) can also be given, in which case the coefficients of the characteristic polynomial of the matrix are returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定零序列的前导系数为1的多项式的系数(序列中的多根必须与它们的倍数相同,参见示例)。也可以给定一个方阵(或数组,它将被视为矩阵),在这种情况下,将返回矩阵的特征多项式的系数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the data type with the smallest size and smallest scalar kind to which both type1 and type2 may be safely cast.
trans-unit.target: 返回具有最小大小和最小标量类型的数据类型，可以将 type2 type1 和类型2都安全地转换为该数据类型。

trans-unit.source: Returns the data type with the smallest size and smallest scalar kind to which both type1 and type2 may be safely cast. The returned data type is always in native byte order.
trans-unit.target: 返回具有最小大小和最小标量类型的数据类型，可以将 type2 type1 和类型2都安全地转换为该数据类型。返回的数据类型始终以本机字节顺序。

trans-unit.source: Returns the difference of two Chebyshev series c1 - c2. The sequences of coefficients are from lowest order term to highest, i.e., [1,2,3] represents the series T_0 + 2*T_1 + 3*T_2.
trans-unit.target: 返回两个切比雪夫系列 c1 - c2 的差。系数的序列是从最低阶项到最高阶，即[1,2,3]表示序列 T_0 + 2*T_1 + 3*T_2 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the difference of two Hermite series c1 - c2. The sequences of coefficients are from lowest order term to highest, i.e., [1,2,3] represents the series P_0 + 2*P_1 + 3*P_2.
trans-unit.target: 返回两个Hermite系列 c1 - c2 的差。系数的序列从最低阶项到最高阶，即[1,2,3]表示序列 P_0 + 2*P_1 + 3*P_2 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the difference of two Laguerre series c1 - c2. The sequences of coefficients are from lowest order term to highest, i.e., [1,2,3] represents the series P_0 + 2*P_1 + 3*P_2.
trans-unit.target: 返回两个Laguerre级数 c1 - c2 的差。系数的序列从最低阶项到最高阶，即[1,2,3]表示序列 P_0 + 2*P_1 + 3*P_2 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the difference of two Legendre series c1 - c2. The sequences of coefficients are from lowest order term to highest, i.e., [1,2,3] represents the series P_0 + 2*P_1 + 3*P_2.
trans-unit.target: 返回两个Legendre系列 c1 - c2 的差。系数的序列从最低阶项到最高阶，即[1,2,3]表示序列 P_0 + 2*P_1 + 3*P_2 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the difference of two polynomials c1 - c2. The arguments are sequences of coefficients from lowest order term to highest, i.e., [1,2,3] represents the polynomial 1 + 2*x + 3*x**2.

trans-unit.source: Returns the dot product of the supplied arrays.

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of elements being iterated. This is the product of all the dimensions in the shape. Such an iterator is invalid, but may become valid after NpyIter_RemoveAxis is called. It is not necessary to check for this case.

trans-unit.source: Returns the series coefficients c differentiated m times along axis. At each iteration the result is multiplied by scl (the scaling factor is for use in a linear change of variable). The argument c is an array of coefficients from low to high degree along each axis, e.g., [1,2,3] represents the series 1*He_0 + 2*He_1 + 3*He_2 while [[1,2],[1,2]] represents 1*He_0(x)*He_0(y) + 1*He_1(x)*He_0(y) + 2*He_0(x)*He_1(y) + 2*He_1(x)*He_1(y) if axis=0 is x and axis=1 is y.

trans-unit.source: Review process:

Reviewers (the other developers and interested community members) will write inline and/or general comments on your Pull Request (PR) to help you improve its implementation, documentation and style. Every single developer working on the project has their code reviewed, and we’ve come to see it as friendly conversation from which we all learn and the overall code quality benefits. Therefore, please don’t let the review discourage you from contributing: its only aim is to improve the quality of project, not to criticize (we are, after all, very grateful for the time you’re donating!).

trans-unit.source: SIP (used mainly in PyQT)

SIP is another tool for wrapping C/C++ libraries that is Python specific and appears to have very good support for C++. Riverbank Computing developed SIP in order to create Python bindings to the QT library. An interface file must be written to generate the binding, but the interface file looks a lot like a C/C++ header file. While SIP is not a full C++ parser, it understands quite a bit of C++ syntax as well as its own special directives that allow modification of how the Python binding is accomplished. It also allows the user to define mappings between Python types and C/C++ structures and classes.

trans-unit.source: Samples are drawn from a hypergeometric distribution with specified parameters, ngood (ways to make a good selection), nbad (ways to make a bad selection), and nsample (number of items sampled, which is less than or equal to the sum ngood + nbad).
trans-unit.target: 样品从一个超几何分布绘制指定的参数， ngood （方式，使一个很好的选择）， nbad （方法来进行不良选择），和 nsample （抽样商品的数量，这是小于或等于所述总和 ngood + nbad ）。

trans-unit.source: Samples are drawn from a log series distribution with specified shape parameter, 0 < p < 1.

trans-unit.source: Samples are drawn from a logistic distribution with specified parameters, loc (location or mean, also median), and scale (>0).
trans-unit.target: 从具有指定参数，位置（位置或均值，也为中位数）和比例（> 0）的对数分布中抽取样本。

trans-unit.source: Samples are drawn from a negative binomial distribution with specified parameters, n successes and p probability of success where n is > 0 and p is in the interval (0, 1].
Samples are drawn from a negative binomial distribution with specified parameters, n successes and p probability of success where n is > 0 and p is in the interval [0, 1].
trans-unit.target: 从具有指定参数， n 次成功和 p 次成功概率的负二项式分布中抽取样本，其中 n > 0且 p 在[0，1]区间内。

trans-unit.source: Samples are drawn from a von Mises distribution with specified mode (mu) and dispersion (kappa), on the interval [-pi, pi].
trans-unit.target: 样本从冯-米塞斯分布中抽取,在[-pi,pi]的区间上有特定的模态(μ)和离散度(kappa)。

trans-unit.source: Samples are drawn from an F distribution with specified parameters, dfnum (degrees of freedom in numerator) and dfden (degrees of freedom in denominator), where both parameters > 1. nonc is the non-centrality parameter.
trans-unit.target: 从具有指定参数 dfnum （分子的自由度）和 dfden （分母的自由度）的F分布中抽取样本，其中两个参数均大于 nonc 是非中心性参数。

trans-unit.source: SciPy Lecture Notes
SciPy Tutorial

SciPy consists of Python packages, called SciPy packages, that are available to Python users via the scipy namespace. Each SciPy package may contain other SciPy packages. And so on. Therefore, the SciPy directory tree is a tree of packages with arbitrary depth and width. Any SciPy package may depend on NumPy packages but the dependence on other SciPy packages should be kept minimal or zero.
trans-unit.target: SciPy由称为SciPy软件包的Python软件包组成，可通过 scipy 名称空间供Python用户使用。每个SciPy程序包可能包含其他SciPy程序包。等等。因此，SciPy目录树是具有任意深度和宽度的包的树。任何SciPy软件包都可能依赖于NumPy软件包，但对其他SciPy软件包的依赖关系应保持最小或为零。

trans-unit.source: Several algorithms in NumPy work on arbitrarily strided arrays. However, some algorithms require single-segment arrays. When an irregularly strided array is passed in to such algorithms, a copy is automatically made.
trans-unit.target: NumPy中的一些算法都是在任意跨度的数组上工作的。但是,有些算法需要使用单段数组。当一个不规则步长的数组被传入这类算法时,会自动进行复制。

trans-unit.source: Several array-creation functions of the ndarray allow specification of a particular sub-type to be created. This allows sub-types to be handled seamlessly in many routines. When a sub-type is created in such a fashion, however, neither the __new__ method nor the __init__ method gets called. Instead, the sub-type is allocated and the appropriate instance-structure members are filled in. Finally, the __array_finalize__ attribute is looked-up in the object dictionary. If it is present and not None, then it can be either a CObject containing a pointer to a PyArray_FinalizeFunc or it can be a method taking a single argument (which could be None).

trans-unit.source: Several new types are defined in the C-code. Most of these are accessible from Python, but a few are not exposed due to their limited use. Every new Python type has an associated PyObject * with an internal structure that includes a pointer to a “method table” that defines how the new object behaves in Python. When you receive a Python object into C code, you always get a pointer to a PyObject structure. Because a PyObject structure is very generic and defines only PyObject_HEAD, by itself it is not very interesting. However, different objects contain more details after the PyObject_HEAD (but you have to cast to the correct type to access them — or use accessor functions or macros).
trans-unit.target: C代码中定义了几种新类型。这些中的大多数都可以从Python访问，但由于使用受限，因此其中一些不公开。每个新的Python类型都有一个关联的 PyObject * ，其内部结构包含指向“方法表”的指针，该方法定义了新对象在Python中的行为。当您将Python对象接收到C代码中时，总会得到一个指向 PyObject 结构的指针。因为 PyObject 结构非常通用并且仅定义 PyObject_HEAD ，所以它不是很有趣。但是，不同的对象在 PyObject_HEAD 之后包含更多详细信息（但必须强制转换为正确的类型才能访问它们-或使用访问器函数或宏）。

Shape (length along each transformed axis) to use from the input. (s[0] refers to axis 0, s[1] to axis 1, etc.). The final element of s corresponds to n for rfft(x, n), while for the remaining axes, it corresponds to n for fft(x, n). Along any axis, if the given shape is smaller than that of the input, the input is cropped. If it is larger, the input is padded with zeros. if s is not given, the shape of the input along the axes specified by axes is used.
trans-unit.target: 输入要使用的形状（沿每个变换轴的长度）。（ s[0] 表示轴0， s[1] 表示轴1，依此类推）。的最终元件 s 相当于 n 为 rfft(x, n) 而其余的轴，它对应于 n 为 fft(x, n) 。沿任意轴，如果给定的形状小于输入的形状，则将裁剪输入。如果较大，则输入将填充零。如果未指定 s ，则使用沿轴指定的 axes 的输入形状。

trans-unit.source: Shape (length of each axis) of the output (s[0] refers to axis 0, s[1] to axis 1, etc.). This corresponds to n for ifft(x, n). Along each axis, if the given shape is smaller than that of the input, the input is cropped. If it is larger, the input is padded with zeros. if s is not given, the shape of the input along the axes specified by axes is used. See notes for issue on ifft zero padding.
trans-unit.target: 输出的形状（每个轴的长度）（ s[0] 指向轴0， s[1] 指向轴1，依此类推）。这对应于 n 为 ifft(x, n) 。沿每个轴，如果给定的形状小于输入的形状，则将裁剪输入。如果较大，则输入将填充零。如果未指定 s ，则使用沿轴指定的 axes 的输入形状。请参阅有关 ifft 零填充问题的注释。

trans-unit.source: Shape (length of each transformed axis) of the output (s[0] refers to axis 0, s[1] to axis 1, etc.). s is also the number of input points used along this axis, except for the last axis, where s[-1]//2+1 points of the input are used. Along any axis, if the shape indicated by s is smaller than that of the input, the input is cropped. If it is larger, the input is padded with zeros. If s is not given, the shape of the input along the axes specified by axes is used.
trans-unit.target: 输出的形状（每个转换轴的长度）（ s[0] 指向轴0， s[1] 指向轴1，等等）。 s 也是沿着该轴使用的输入点数，除了最后一个轴（其中使用了输入的 s[-1]//2+1 点）。沿任何轴，如果 s 表示的形状小于输入的形状，则将裁剪输入。如果较大，则输入将填充零。如果未指定 s ，则使用沿轴指定的 axes 的输入形状。

trans-unit.source: Shape (length of each transformed axis) of the output (s[0] refers to axis 0, s[1] to axis 1, etc.). s is also the number of input points used along this axis, except for the last axis, where s[-1]//2+1 points of the input are used. Along any axis, if the shape indicated by s is smaller than that of the input, the input is cropped. If it is larger, the input is padded with zeros. If s is not given, the shape of the input along the axes specified by axes is used. Except for the last axis which is taken to be 2*(m-1) where m is the length of the input along that axis.

trans-unit.source: Simplified Wrapper and Interface Generator (SWIG) is an old and fairly stable method for wrapping C/C++-libraries to a large variety of other languages. It does not specifically understand NumPy arrays but can be made useable with NumPy through the use of typemaps. There are some sample typemaps in the numpy/tools/swig directory under numpy.i together with an example module that makes use of them. SWIG excels at wrapping large C/C++ libraries because it can (almost) parse their headers and auto-produce an interface. Technically, you need to generate a .i file that defines the interface. Often, however, this .i file can be parts of the header itself. The interface usually needs a bit of tweaking to be very useful. This ability to parse C/C++ headers and auto-generate the interface still makes SWIG a useful approach to adding functionalilty from C/C++ into Python, despite the other methods that have emerged that are more targeted to Python. SWIG can actually target extensions for several languages, but the typemaps usually have to be language-specific. Nonetheless, with modifications to the Python-specific typemaps, SWIG can be used to interface a library with other languages such as Perl, Tcl, and Ruby.

So if this is true, why not choose the index order that matches what you most expect? In particular, why not define row-ordered images to use the image convention? (This is sometimes referred to as the Fortran convention vs the C convention, thus the ‘C’ and ‘FORTRAN’ order options for array ordering in numpy.) The drawback of doing this is potential performance penalties. It’s common to access the data sequentially, either implicitly in array operations or explicitly by looping over rows of an image. When that is done, then the data will be accessed in non-optimal order. As the first index is incremented, what is actually happening is that elements spaced far apart in memory are being sequentially accessed, with usually poor memory access speeds. For example, for a two dimensional image ‘im’ defined so that im[0, 10] represents the value at x=0, y=10. To be consistent with usual Python behavior then im[0] would represent a column at x=0. Yet that data would be spread over the whole array since the data are stored in row order. Despite the flexibility of numpy’s indexing, it can’t really paper over the fact basic operations are rendered inefficient because of data order or that getting contiguous subarrays is still awkward (e.g., im[:,0] for the first row, vs im[0]), thus one can’t use an idiom such as for row in im; for col in im does work, but doesn’t yield contiguous column data.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果这是真的，为什么不选择与您最期望的匹配的索引顺序呢？特别是为什么不定义按行排序的图像以使用图像约定？ （这有时被称为Fortran约定与C约定，因此以numpy进行数组排序的'C'和'FORTRAN'排序选项。）这样做的缺点是潜在的性能损失。顺序访问数据是很常见的，既可以隐式地在数组操作中访问，也可以通过循环遍历图像的行来显式访问。完成此操作后，将以非最佳顺序访问数据。随着第一个索引的增加，实际上发生的事情是顺序访问内存中间隔很远的元素，通常访问内存的速度较差。例如，对于定义为使im [0，10]表示x = 0处的值的二维图像“ im”，y = 10。为了与通常的Python行为保持一致，则im [0]将表示x = 0处的列。但是，由于数据按行顺序存储，因此该数据将散布在整个阵列上。尽管numpy的索引具有灵活性，但它无法真正说明由于数据顺序使基本操作效率低下或获取连续子数组仍然很尴尬的事实（例如，第一行的im [：，0]与im [ 0]），因此不能使用诸如im中的row这样的惯用语； for im in col可以工作，但不会产生连续的列数据。它不能真正地说明由于数据顺序使基本操作效率低下或获得连续子数组仍然很尴尬的事实（例如，第一行的im [：，0]与im [0]相对），因此可以不要在im中使用诸如for的成语； for im in col可以工作，但不会产生连续的列数据。它不能真正地说明由于数据顺序使基本操作效率低下或获得连续子数组仍然很尴尬的事实（例如，第一行的im [：，0]与im [0]相对），因此可以不要在im中使用诸如for的成语； for im in col可以工作，但不会产生连续的列数据。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the calculation iteration order/memory layout of the output array. Defaults to ‘K’. ‘C’ means the output should be C-contiguous, ‘F’ means F-contiguous, ‘A’ means F-contiguous if the inputs are F-contiguous and not also not C-contiguous, C-contiguous otherwise, and ‘K’ means to match the element ordering of the inputs as closely as possible.
trans-unit.target: 指定输出数组的计算迭代顺序/内存布局。默认为“ K”。'C'表示输出应该是C连续的，'F'表示F是连续的，如果输入是F连续的并且不是C连续的，'A'是F连续的，否则输入是C连续的，'K '表示要尽可能匹配输入的元素顺序。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the minimum number of dimensions that the resulting array should have. Ones will be pre-pended to the shape as needed to meet this requirement.
trans-unit.target: 指定生成的数组的最小维数。根据需要,将在形状上预先添加一,以满足这一要求。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the subscripts for summation as comma separated list of subscript labels. An implicit (classical Einstein summation) calculation is performed unless the explicit indicator ‘->’ is included as well as subscript labels of the precise output form.
trans-unit.target: 将要求和的下标指定为下标标签的逗号分隔列表。除非包含显式指示符“->”以及精确输出形式的下标标签，否则将执行隐式（经典的爱因斯坦求和）计算。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the subscripts for summation.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the calculation is done with the lower triangular part of a (‘L’, default) or the upper triangular part (‘U’). Irrespective of this value only the real parts of the diagonal will be considered in the computation to preserve the notion of a Hermitian matrix. It therefore follows that the imaginary part of the diagonal will always be treated as zero.
trans-unit.target: 指定的计算是否与的下三角部分进行 a （“L”，缺省值）或上三角部分（“U”）。不管该值如何，在计算中仅考虑对角线的实部以保留厄米矩阵的概念。因此得出结论，对角线的虚部将始终被视为零。

trans-unit.source: Specify the order of the array. If order is ‘C’ (default), then the array will be in C-contiguous order (last-index varies the fastest). If order is ‘A’, then the returned array may be in any order (either C-, Fortran-contiguous, or even discontiguous).
trans-unit.target: 指定数组的顺序。如果order为'C'（默认值），则数组将为C连续顺序（last-index变化最快）。如果order为'F'，则返回的数组将为Fortran连续顺序（first-index变化最快）。如果order为'A'，则返回的数组可以为任何顺序（C-，Fortran连续或什至不连续）。

trans-unit.source: Specify the order of the array. If order is ‘C’, then the array will be in C-contiguous order (last-index varies the fastest). If order is ‘F’, then the returned array will be in Fortran-contiguous order (first-index varies the fastest). If order is ‘A’ (default), then the returned array may be in any order (either C-, Fortran-contiguous, or even discontiguous), unless a copy is required, in which case it will be C-contiguous.
trans-unit.target: 指定数组的顺序。如果order为'C'，则数组将为C连续顺序（last-index变化最快）。如果order为'F'，则返回的数组将为Fortran连续顺序（first-index变化最快）。如果order为'A'（默认值），则返回的数组可以为任何顺序（C-，Fortran连续或什至不连续），除非需要复制，在这种情况下它将是C连续的。

trans-unit.source: Starting from numpy 1.3.0, we are working on separating the pure C, “computational” code from the python dependent code. The goal is twofolds: making the code cleaner, and enabling code reuse by other extensions outside numpy (scipy, etc…).

trans-unit.source: Starting in NumPy 1.9, promote_types function now returns a valid string length when given an integer or float dtype as one argument and a string dtype as another argument. Previously it always returned the input string dtype, even if it wasn’t long enough to store the max integer/float value converted to a string.

trans-unit.source: Stores all of the necessary information to reconstruct the array including shape and dtype on a machine of a different architecture. Both little-endian and big-endian arrays are supported, and a file with little-endian numbers will yield a little-endian array on any machine reading the file. The types are described in terms of their actual sizes. For example, if a machine with a 64-bit C “long int” writes out an array with “long ints”, a reading machine with 32-bit C “long ints” will yield an array with 64-bit integers.
trans-unit.target: 存储所有必要的信息以在不同体系结构的计算机上重建包括shape和dtype的数组。little-endian和big-endian数组均受支持，并且具有little-endian编号的文件将在读取该文件的任何计算机上生成一个little-endian数组。这些类型根据其实际大小进行描述。例如，如果一台具有64位C“ long int”的机器写出一个具有“ long ints”的数组，那么一台具有32位C“ long int”的读取机将产生一个具有64位整数的数组。

trans-unit.source: Strided copy code: Here, “uint alignment” is used instead. If the itemsize of an array is equal to 1, 2, 4, 8 or 16 bytes and the array is uint aligned then instead numpy will do *(uintN*)dst) = *(uintN*)src) for appropriate N. Otherwise numpy copies by doing memcpy(dst, src, N).
trans-unit.target: 交错的复制代码：在这里，使用“统一对齐”。如果数组的项目大小等于1、2、4、8或16个字节，并且数组是uint对齐的，那么numpy会对适当的N 做 *(uintN*)dst) = *(uintN*)src) 。通过执行 memcpy(dst, src, N) 进行numpy复制。

trans-unit.source: Structured arrays can also be assigned to unstructured arrays, but only if the structured datatype has just a single field:
Structured arrays indexed with non-existent fields raise KeyError not ValueError
Structured arrays.

Structured data types are formed by creating a data type whose field contain other data types. Each field has a name by which it can be accessed. The parent data type should be of sufficient size to contain all its fields; the parent is nearly always based on the void type which allows an arbitrary item size. Structured data types may also contain nested structured sub-array data types in their fields.

Structured data types are formed by creating a data type whose field contain other data types. Each field has a name by which it can be accessed. The parent data type should be of sufficient size to contain all its fields; the parent is nearly always based on the void type which allows an arbitrary item size. Structured data types may also contain nested structured sub-array data types in their fields.
trans-unit.target: 通过创建其字段包含其他数据类型的数据类型来形成结构化数据类型。每个字段都有一个可以访问的名称。父数据类型的大小应足以容纳其所有字段；父级几乎总是基于允许任意项目大小的 void 类型。结构化数据类型还可以在其字段中包含嵌套的结构化子数组数据类型。

trans-unit.source: Structured datatypes are designed to be able to mimic ‘structs’ in the C language, and share a similar memory layout. They are meant for interfacing with C code and for low-level manipulation of structured buffers, for example for interpreting binary blobs. For these purposes they support specialized features such as subarrays, nested datatypes, and unions, and allow control over the memory layout of the structure.

Structured datatypes are implemented in numpy to have base type numpy.void by default, but it is possible to interpret other numpy types as structured types using the (base_dtype, dtype) form of dtype specification described in Data Type Objects. Here, base_dtype is the desired underlying dtype, and fields and flags will be copied from dtype. This dtype is similar to a ‘union’ in C.

Structured datatypes may be created using the function numpy.dtype. There are 4 alternative forms of specification which vary in flexibility and conciseness. These are further documented in the Data Type Objects reference page, and in summary they are:
